summary: Los Angeles private investigator Harry Moseby is hired by a client to find her runaway teenage daughter. Moseby tracks the daughter down, only to stumble upon something much more intriguing and sinister.
cast: Gene Hackman|Jennifer Warren|Edward Binns|Harris Yulin|Kenneth Mars|Janet Ward|James Woods|Anthony Costello|John Crawford|Melanie Griffith|Ben Archibek|Dennis Dugan|C.J. Hincks|Max Gail|Susan Barrister|Larry Mitchell|Susan Clark|Phil Altman|Neil Brooks Cunningham|Michael Ebert|Louie Elias|René Enríquez|Avril Gentles|Tim Haldeman|Carey Loftin|John Moio|Victor Paul|Christopher Riordan|Sandra Seacat|Bob Templeton|Jacque E. Wallace|Fred Waugh
title: La noche se mueve
